incidents.name: Voice Intelligence is Degraded

incident_updates.body: Engineers have identified the issue impacting Language Operators powered by OpenAI within our Voice Intelligence product and are working with the vendor to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in the 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Customers using Language Operators powered by OpenAI may see delays in their Transcripts and Language Operator results being available. Our engineering teams are working on resolving the issue, and we will provide another update in the next 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Subset of Conversational Messages failed with Invalid Validity Period (Twilio Error Code 21624 or 90007)

incident_updates.body: On June 5, 2025 between 12:12 PM and 12:58 PM PST, customers using Conversational Messages may have seen an increase in failed messages due to Invalid Validity Period, resulting in Twilio error code 21624 for SMS messages or error code 90007 for other messaging channels.
